data_controller.title: Data Controller
data_controller.description: Data controllers are the entities responsible for making decisions about the collection and processing of personal data. Data controllers bear the primary responsibility for complying with the provisions in data governance frameworks.

data_processor.title: Data Processor
data_processor.description: Data processors process data on behalf of controllers, but do not make decisions about what data is collected or how it is used. Data processors are not counted as a separate entity in every framework, but when they are addressed, they always have reduced obligations for compliance compared to controllers due to their more indirect relationship to data subjects.

personal_data.title: Personal Data
personal_data.description: Personal data is the umbrella term for all information collected about an individual that must be protected according to the provisions of the listed data protection frameworks.

sensitive_personal_data.title: Sensitive Personal Data
sensitive_personal_data.description: Sensitive personal data is personal information whose disclosure carries a particularly high risk of abuse or discrimination for the data subject, and for this reason is often given enhanced protections under data protection frameworks.

consent_requirement.title: Consent Requirement
consent_requirement.description: Does the framework include a requirement that data controllers obtain consent from subjects before collecting and using their personal data?

consent_exceptions.title: Consent Exceptions
consent_exceptions.description: Under what circumstances may controllers collect and process personal data if the subject has not given their consent?

conditions_for_consent.title: Conditions for Consent
conditions_for_consent.description: What standards must data controllers meet in order for consent by subjects to be considered legitimate?

conditions_for_access.title: Conditions for Access
conditions_for_access.description: Does the data protection framework mandate that controllers respond to requests by data subjects in a particular way?

right_to_information.title: Conditions for Access
right_to_information.description: Do data subjects have a right to be provided information about the processing of their data upon request to a controller?

right_to_access.title: Right to Access
right_to_access.description: Do data subjects have a right to access the personal information a controller has collected from/about them?

right_to_correction.title: Right to Correction
right_to_correction.description: Do data subjects have a right to correct data of theirs held by a controller?

right_to_erasure.title: Right to Erasure
right_to_erasure.description: Do data subjects have a right to request the erasure of their personal data held by a controller?

right_to_object_processing.title: Right to Object Processing
right_to_object_processing.description: Do data subjects have the right to object to the processing of their data?

right_to_withdraw_consent.title: Right to Withdraw Consent
right_to_withdraw_consent.description: Do data subjects have the right to withdraw consent to prevent the further processing of their personal data by a controller?

right_to_challenge_denials.title: Right to Challenge Denials
right_to_challenge_denials.description: Can data subjects challenge a denial by a data controller to honor a request by the data subject?

portability.title: Portability
portability.description: Do data subjects have the right to access their personal data in a form that would allow it to be easily transferred to another controller?

automated_processing.title: Automated Processing
automated_processing.description: Are individuals subject to decisions made about them by automated systems with no human intervention?

lawful_and_fair.title: Lawful and Fair
lawful_and_fair.description: Do the data protection frameworks require processing to be conducted in a lawful and fair manner?

disclosure_of_purpose.title: Disclosure of Purpose
disclosure_of_purpose.description: Does the data protection framework require controllers to disclose the specific purpose of processing to data subjects?

use_limitation.title: Use Limitation
use_limitation.description: Does the data protection framework put restrictions on how data can be used by controllers once it has been collected?

minimization.title: Minimization
minimization.description: Does the data protection framework put restrictions on how much data can be collected by controllers?

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Does the data protection framework require the controller to provide contextual information to the subject before collection?

data_quality.title: Data Quality
data_quality.description: Does the data protection framework require data controllers to maintain collected data at a certain standard of accuracy and quality?

security.title: Security
security.description: Does the data protection framework require controllers take measures to protect the personal data they posses against loss or unauthorized access?

data_breach_notification.title: Data Breach Notification
data_breach_notification.description: Does the data protection framework require controllers to notify subjects or official authorities in the event of a data breach?

retention.title: Retention
retention.description: Does the data protection framework place restrictions on how long a controller may retain personal data it has collected?

cross_border_transfers.title: Cross Border Transfers
cross_border_transfers.description: Under what conditions does the data protection framework allow controllers to transfer personal data outside the jurisdiction of the territory covered by the framework?

accountability.title: Accountability
accountability.description: Does the data protection framework hold controllers accountable for adherence to the principles?

privacy_by_design.title: Privacy by Design
privacy_by_design.description: Does the data protection framework require controllers to implement privacy and protection by design in the construction and operation of their systems?
